name: DECRYPT-IT
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/XmELvigUwxZXfegQ9

Greater than god, more wicked than the devil. The poor have it, the rich need it. Eat it, you die. Meet Felix, a boy who is destined to have nothing , everything he did, seems useless. Until one day, Felix wakes up in a place unfamiliar, which he later is a confinement for him by a mysterious person. Seemingly nothing wrong. Will he be able cover more than what's hidden? Who is this mysterious person? Will Felix finally be able to change his fate from the curse of nothings??
